interface.name: rdkshell_client_control
interface.description: It can be used by the home app to control the window of an inactive app.

description.summary: sets client window bounds and scale

request.description: Sets client window bounds and scale.

arg.name: x
arg.summary: the left position of the surface in pixel screen coordinates

arg.name: y
arg.summary: the top position of the surface in pixel screen coordinates

arg.name: width
arg.summary: the width of the video surface in pixel screen coordinates

arg.name: height
arg.summary: the height of the video surface in pixel screen coordinates

arg.summary: the top position of the surface in pixel screen coordinates
